ModMetaData.name: Groundhog Save
ModMetaData.author: Andreas Pardeike
ModMetaData.description:
Groundhog Save will save a new commitment game in a way so you can load it once and still enjoy commitment mode without setting up everything after a failed run attempt!
If you like this mod, check out my other mods on steam: https://steamcommunity.com/id/brrainz/myworkshopfiles/
Powered by Harmony Patch Library
/Brrainz
